sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <plugin id="com.snc.knowledge_document" name="Knowledge Document" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" state="published" help="Knowledge_Document" type="feature_set" invalidate_properties="true"> <description>This plugin adds knowledge based functionalities to the document management plugin. You can create a knowledge article from a document, or update a knowledge document to a newer revision.</description> <requires> <import plugin="com.snc.document_management"/> </requires> </plugin>]]></definition> <description>This plugin adds knowledge based functionalities to the document management plugin. You can create a knowledge article from a document, or update a knowledge document to a newer revision.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Knowledge_Document</help> <id>com.snc.knowledge_document</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Knowledge Document</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.knowledge_document/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.document_management</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.knowledge_document</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type>feature_set</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
